## Project Overview

This is a microservice web app that manages financial transactions such as expenses and income.
The goal of this app is "At glance, I know where my money goes."
It provides RESTful APIs to create, read, update, and delete financial records.
It is built using Java 25, Spring Boot, and uses H2 as the database.

---

## Libraries and Frameworks
- Java 25
- Spring Boot 4.x.x
- Spring Data JPA
- Spring Web
- H2 Database
- Spring Boot Actuator
- Maven
- JUnit 5
- Spring Web
